description:
These rock-worthy pants are always up for another burn. The gusseted crotch and articulated knees let you move freely to high-step and rock over. The durable organic cotton blend is airy and breathable, yet tough as nails. Climb on.

  • Made of organic cotton blended with polyester and spandex. Hollow polyester fibres add breathability
  • DWR finish sheds moisture
  • Articulated fit with knee darts and a gusseted crotch to enhance movement and comfort under a harness
  • Zippered fly with belt loops and Patagonia OppoSet adjustable waist for a customized fit that's comfortable under a harness or hipbelt
  • Drop-in pockets have breathable mesh liners and darts for lay-flat entry
  • 2 back pockets create a reinforced seat for extra durability
  • Low-profile side pocket has an inner mesh pocket for valuables
name: Patagonia Venga Rock Pants - Men's
